Place One - Mayor
=================

![Document](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/revize_photo_gallery/Government/City%20Council/Place%20One%20Mayor/Document.png?t=202311300840010)

| ![request button](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/request%20button.jpg?t=202410241053410) | * **Residents may request the mayor's presence for various events, such as opening ceremonies, ribbon cuttings, and dedications.** * **You may complete a request form by clicking   [HERE](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/government/city_council/find_your_councilmember/place_one_mayor/mayoral_requests.php)   .** * **Request a Ceremonial item by clicking   [HERE](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/government/city_council/find_your_councilmember/place_one_mayor/mayoral_requests.php)   (Proclamation,       Special Recognition, etc.)** |
| ![My short bio - marcelbootsman.nl](https://marcelbootsman.nl/img/containers/images/about-me.jpg/76c442fda636c9d0aa5e17424a13e4e6/about-me.webp) | * **Learn more about Mayor Rachel Proctor: Explore her leadership vision and contributions to the DeSoto community.** * **Discover her journey: Click   [HERE](https://www.desototexas.gov/government/city_council/find_your_councilmember/place_one_mayor/full_bio.php)   to read Mayor Proctors's full biography, including her personal and professional milestones.** |
| ![Dais Group (Use for Website)](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/revize_photo_gallery/Photos/Dais%20Group%20(Use%20for%20Website).jpg?t=202508261155590) | * **Schedule a meeting with Mayor Proctor: Interested in discussing city matters directly with the Mayor?** * **Meet with a Councilmember: Click   [HERE](https://www.desototexas.gov/government/city_council/find_your_councilmember/place_one_mayor/request_form.php)   to request a meeting with either the Mayor or a Councilmember by filling out our request form** |
| ![Contact Us Icons Red Stock Illustrations – 202 Contact Us Icons Red Stock  Illustrations, Vectors & Clipart - Dreamstime](https://thumbs.dreamstime.com/b/contact-us-button-vector-illustration-red-web-icon-white-background-121902413.jpg) | * **Get in touch with the City of DeSoto: Have questions or need       assistance?** * **Contact us today: Call us at 972.230.9645 for more information or support.** |

| ![City of DeSoto on LinkedIn: #internshipprogram #springcohort #somuchtolove  #cityofdesoto](https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D5622AQEz7cGV4Fyu0w/feedshare-shrink_800/feedshare-shrink_800/0/1712324995890?e=2147483647&v=beta&t=e9mjH6nUZTI3sq5cZljfp-4z8zwCMUPpSVjlTCNp0eI) | * **Mayor's Internship Program: A great opportunity for**       **students to gain hands-on experience in city government.** * **Learn more: Click   [HERE](https://www.desototexas.gov/government/city_council/find_your_councilmember/place_one_mayor/mayors_internship_program.php)   for additional details and application information about the Mayor's Internship Program** |
| ![American Family Insurance Dreams Foundation recognizes six employees with  first-ever Community Champion Award](https://content.presspage.com/uploads/1467/1920_communitychampion-logo.jpg?10000) | * **DeSoto Community and Champion Award: Honoring residents who have made exceptional contributions to improve and positively impact the local community.** * **Learn more: Click   [HERE](https://www.desototexas.gov/community/volunteer_opportunities/desoto_community_champion_recognition_award.php)   for more information on the award and how to nominate someone deserving.** |
| ![City of DeSoto | The Mayor's Quarterly 360 Meeting is underway and Mayor  Pro Tem Letitia Hughes is sitting in for Mayor Rachel Proctor. | Instagram](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQwRISmtmlaPNI0GGhXXZzvRpb5Plq0AQ5PZA&s) | * **Mayor's Quarterly 360 Meeting: A forum for Homeowners’ Association representatives and citizens to discuss community issues and upcoming projects with the Mayor.**  * **Stay informed: Click   [HERE](https://www.desototexas.gov/community/homeowners_and_neighborhood_associations_/mayors_quarterly_meetings.php)   to learn more about these important meetings and how to participate.** |

| ![Let's Talk Business: COAD (Community Organizations Active in Disaster)](https://npr.brightspotcdn.com/dims4/default/483f34c/2147483647/strip/true/crop/649x259+0+0/resize/880x351!/quality/90/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fnpr-brightspot.s3.amazonaws.com%2Flegacy%2Fsites%2Fkrcu%2Ffiles%2F201703%2FCOAD.PNG) | * **DeSoto COAD: A group of independent organizations offering support through donations, volunteers, and emotional or financial aid during disasters or emergencies.** * **Learn more: Click   [HERE](https://www.desototexas.gov/departments/fire_rescue/emergency_management/desoto_coad.php)   for additional information on how DeSoto COAD assists residents and how you can get involved.** |

### Contact Us

[211 East Pleasant Run Road DeSoto, TX 75115](https://www.google.com/maps/place/211+E+Pleasant+Run+Rd,+DeSoto,+TX+75115,+USA/@32.6054761,-96.8544484,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m6!3m5!1s0x864e93e988b1bef9:0x71c6f69476e1676f!8m2!3d32.6054761!4d-96.8544484!16s%2Fg%2F11c1_c9g1q?entry=ttu)

972-274-CITY (2489)
[actioncenter@desototexas.gov](mailto:actioncenter@desototexas.gov)
